entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Stony Plain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Plain 06:00 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
Temperature: 11.7°C

Humidity: 49 %

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 27.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
